html:
{%- from "templates/print_formats/standard_macros.html" import add_header, render_field -%}
{{ add_header(0,1,doc,letter_head, no_letterhead) }}
{{doc.organisation_name or ""}}
{{doc.city or ""}}
Date: {{doc.date or ""}}
Quote#



Kind Attention:{{doc.kind_attn or ""}}



Subject:{{doc.subject or "" }}
Dear Sir,

With reference to our discussion, the proposal for {{doc.proposal_for or ""}} installed at this site is attached herewith for your kind consideration.

I would also like to take this opportunity to mention about two of our market-leading service offerings.

LAS-REPAIR program is involved in the repair of MEP assets. It includes the repair of HVAC, plumbing and electrical components. Our skilled multinational manpower is fully equipped to handle the challenges of marketplace.

LAS-REFIT program offers superior quality interior fit out solutions for your offices and living space. It is a completely customized solution that integrates the Client’s budget and design preference into a reality.

Our company also has a trading division called The LASPINAS Building Materials. The range of products supplied includes the entire spectrum of Construction materials and Industrial Consumables.

Please advise any queries or comments you may have on the above or on our proposal. We look forward to your valued response, and assure you of our immediate attention to your requirements at all times.

For and on behalf of LASPINAS Technical Services LLC,



{{doc.signature or ""}}

SCOPE OF WORK:

{{doc.scope_of_work or ""}}

Equipment Details:

{%for i in doc.equipment_details%} {%endfor%}
SL. No. Unit Type Make Quantity Capacity(Tr) Model Number
{{i.sl_no}} {{i.unit_type or ""}} {{i.make or ""}} {{i.quantity or "0"}} {{i.model_number or "" }}


PRICE:

{{doc.price or ""}} for Onetime service is {{doc.base_total or "0"}}

Applicable VAT @5% is {{doc.base_total_taxes_and_charges or "0"}}

Total Amount payable is {{doc.base_grand_total or "0"}}


PAYMENT TERM:

{{doc.payment_terms_detail or ""}}
VALIDITY:

{{doc.validity or ""}}

EXCLUSIONS:

{{doc.exclusions or ""}}

GENERAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS:

{{doc.general_terms_and_conditions or ""}}
{{ footer }}
name: OT Quote
